name: lesser blank talisman
description: A lesser blank paper talisman marked with strange glyphs that seems to wildly absorb and pulse energy. Can be used altering the base glyph to give more complex functions

name: summon talisman
description: A summoning blank talisman marked with strange glyphs that seems eager to push whatever its drawed in it.

name: blank talisman
description: A blank paper talisman marked with strange glyphs that seems to consistently absorb and pulse energy. Can be used altering the base glyph to give more complex functions
